title: Zed is getting nerfed on PBE
body:
What a time to be alive.
Thanks Riot {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: Not a strong nerf though. ..

>
> Not a strong nerf though. ..

Agreed.

It's a small love tap if anything... look at the back alley ripping-apart Gangplank received... and then look at the gentle, caressing, sobbing , kissing love that Zed gets from Riot.
To be fair, GPs first nerfs were love taps too. Give it time Riot likes to build up to a spectacular finale when it comes to buffs and nerfs.
I've been waiting 5 years for Lee Sin's spectacular finale nerfs.Still waiting.

At this point anything that isnt a deletion will be anticlimatic.

Surprise me Rito.

Its pointless to try and reason them. They will always remember that one Lee who outplayed them hard and carried his team and forget the other 20 Lees who were completely useless through the whole game

Fourty-Twoth

LOL
Significant CD increase on his shadow, Hurts his engage, escape, poke, and lane dominance. Also losing 5% ad is pretty significant. Not a Zed player but the nerfs aren't as small as they might seem.

> Significant CD increase on his shadow

Overstating a very small increase in CD and only during early game.

>Hurts his engage, escape, poke, and lane dominance.

Correct, but only very slightly.

>Also losing 5% ad is pretty significant.

5% of his benefit **_bonus AD_** which translates to about (terrible math inc) about 1% of his overall damage. If he had 300 BONUS AD this means he got 15 more damage per strike, or a little bit of damage per ability... which by the way wouldn't add to Contempt for the Weak, Ignite or overstrike.

You are drastically overstating his damage 'nerf'.

QSS Zhonyas goes a long way

Ah, yes, Zhonia's, the item its horrible to rush, doesnt really give you decent amounts of armor and only counters his ult. Along with dooming you to a subpar laning, being pushed to your tower and allow roam because you have no mana engine.

But yes, you are right, I just need to pink ward Zed's ult and Zhonia's his energy based waveclear and harass.

Annoying to know that if Lee Sin, Zed, or Yasuo were pick or ban they would only get small nerfs that would take maybe even months to hit. Though if someone like Urgot or Evelynn were pick or ban you can expect them to be gutted and nearly unplayable within a few days.

Well Urgot and Eve have pretty cancerous kits.  Yasuo, Lee, and Zed being strong are annoying, but Eve or Urgot being strong is just 20x more frustrating.  Will probably get downvoted but that's the sad truth.
May I ask how the kits are cancerous? Not aggressive I promise, I'm just genuinely curious. I play Eve when I can (still trying to get good with support). Urgot just makes me cry.

Because their kits are overly simplistic and have very little room for error. Annie and Panth also fall into this category due to the fact that when they are good they are extremely good since you cannot outplay them. Sure, they can also not outplay you really, but easy no-thought-required kits should not be allowed to be competitively viable kits.

Urgot relies on E->Q spam to do anything relevant and any time that combo is strong him landing E normally means you have to base or you die. That being said, Riot has done their best to nerf this any time it comes up because it is infuriating to lane against and Urgot can't get punished by too many people (in a solo lane) if he misses E. If you try to fight him he will just activate W and walk away and Q spam you anyway.

> [{quoted}](name=Calabok,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EljQkgEE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-03-28T20:52:09.261+0000)
>
> Not a strong nerf though. ..

Well it's better than nothing
A cool down nerf is perfect.  All I need is a better window to punish him for missing his combo.
The bright side is that, despite this being small, it's coming at the same time as the Maw nerf. Riot is being careful not to double nerf champions with item + kit reductions. You know, sometimes.

It's good that they're being gradual about it I guess.  Both the Maw and the Zed nerfs are both pretty minor but hopefully they add up to something worthwhile.  Personally I think they fail to address the main problem with Zed - how much harass and kill potential he has in lane with how ludicrous safe he is.

The Maw nerf won't have any impact if they don't nerf Hexdrinker aswell, after all it's that item which enables Zed and pals to secure lane dominance against ap carries. It's far too cost effective and needs to be either toned down or have its cost increased.

Well, its also that but its also they have been giving him small taps on the wrists with nerfs everytime they change him, from when people were crying for nerfs last season to where Riot was like "oh hur dur let's nerf his attack speed," to the 1 second delay on his ult, which was then changed back to a stupid 0.5 seconds (because from all the out cries from his stupid mains), to his ult pop buffs which he did not need-then were toned down a couple patches ago, and to now these small changes.

While all around him other champions are getting major nerfs and he just gets these small taps on the wrist. It's not hard to see how they are biased towards him. 

We just want him nerfed more like other champions are, but they don't want to pull a Sejuani on their favorite LC$ play boy.
basically 5ad

Ayyyyy

Still permabanning him
Since Zed is supposed to be one of the hardest champs to play he shouldnt have more than 50% win rate.

Zed is the only champion I always ban (or ask a teammate to ban) in every single one of my games. The few times he's gotten picked by the opposing team, he got a couple kills and started killing me from full hp _behind_ my tower, while I blow every ability and summoner spell trying to deal dmg, run away, and stay alive. I have a sneaking suspicion that smurfs use him to climb, because he's freelo at low elo if you are familiar with his kit.

Maw Nerfs and Zed nerfs coming in the same patch
MAGE MAINS REJOICE

This was definitely needed. {{item:3155}} offers not only offensive AD and defensive MR, but ALSO a shield that scales on both the magic resist from the item itself and the resist from blue runes which pretty much every role usually takes. Building {{item:3191}} doesn't cut it anymore.
I'd rather fight Zed than Lux, though.

I'd rather fight Lux than that broken piece of shit. At least you can make her miss her stun and jump on her. Zed can just boom ult and kill you then shadow away laughing with the little health he has left.
.... lux doesn't have a stun....
Uh, her Q? Dude. Fine its her "snare." Still easier to get her to miss it and abuse her than jump on Zed.

I bet you also didn't know the difference between the cc of morgana's ult and her q.

2/10 knowledge of what is happening to u when you play

Are you for real? It was a simple mistake mixing up Lux's CC.

And for the record, you rude person, I do know the difference between the forms of Morgana's CC. Her ult has a slow and a stun, her Q is a snare. I main Morgana.

-10/10 for being a rude person and making wrong assumptions.

Pink wards are actually really effective against leblanc, that 1 second of invisibilty is huge, and if you see her when her passive pops you can tell which one is the clone without checking items.

Have you played LeBlanc? Your W->Q->R->E combo takes a ton of mana, if you miss your chain you've missed out on a ton of damage, and if your opponent is plying close enough to proc your sigil with the W then they're playing badly.

Alternatively, if they're playing a melee mid like Zed then they picked badly. LeBlanc relies on high mana costs and a strong cooldown on her strongest abilities in return for good mobility and strong damage.

Also, she has plenty of counterplay such as walking to the side, or building Hexdrinker/Banshees/Spirit Visage/QSS/Zhonyas/any health

Or play Lissandra or Morgana or Ekko.

But you can't miss your chain.  You literally need to be against someone with a blink or something for that to miss, the hitbox is so retarded. Her combo is so anti-fun, very little to do but lay back and accept your death. Very few can actually play safe against her, especially once she hits six.
